resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106762</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106762</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206209</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Radio JOVE: Planetary Radio Astronomy for Schools</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radio JOVE: Planetarische Radioastronomie 
für Schulen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Radio JOVE : Astronomie par radio 
planétaire pour des écoles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rádio JOVE: Astronomia de rádio 
planetária para escolas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radio JOVE: Astronomia radiofonica 
planetaria per le scuole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραδιο JOVE: Πλανητική ραδιο αστρονομία για τα 
σχολεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radio JOVE: Astronomía de radio planetaria 
para las escuelas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps students and amateur scientists observe and analyze natural radio emissions of Jupiter and the Sun. Through the study of their magnetic fields and their plasma (charged particle) environments, we are better able to understand the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen Kursteilnehmer und laienhafte 
Wissenschaftler beobachten und analysieren natürliche Radioemissionen
von Jupiter und von Sonne. Durch die Studie von ihrem 
magnetischen fängt auf und ihre Umgebungen des Plasmas 
(belasteter Partikel), können wir besser, die Masse zu verstehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants d'aides et les scientifiques 
d'amateur observent et analysent les émissions par radio normales de 
Jupiter et du soleil. Par l'étude de leurs champs magnétiques 
et de leurs environnements de plasma (particule chargée), nous 
pouvons mieux comprendre la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os estudantes das ajudas e os cientistas amadores 
observam e analisam emissões de rádio naturais de Jupiter e do sol. 
Com o estudo de seus campos magnéticos e de seus ambientes do 
plasma (partícula carregada), nós podemos mais melhor  compreender a
terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli allievi di aiuti e gli scienziati dilettanti 
osservano ed analizzano le emissioni radiofoniche naturali di Jupiter 
e del sole. Con lo studio sui loro campi magnetici e sui loro 
ambienti del plasma (particella caricata), possiamo più meglio capire
la terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι σπουδαστές οδηγιών και οι ερασιτεχνικοί επιστήμονες
παρατηρούν και αναλύουν τις φυσικές ραδιο εκπομπές Δία και του 
ήλιου. Μέσω της μελέτης των μαγνητικών πεδίων τους και των 
περιβαλλόντων το πλάσμα τους (που χρεώνεται το μόριο), είμαστε 
ικανότεροι να καταλάβουμε τη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los estudiantes de las ayudas y los científicos 
aficionados observan y analizan emisiones de radio naturales de 
Júpiter y del sol. Con el estudio de sus campos magnéticos y 
de sus ambientes del plasma (partícula cargada), podemos mejor  
entender la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206209</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106762</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/radio-jove-planetary-radio-astronomy-for-schools</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
